Content-Type: TEXT/PLAIN; format=flowed; charset=ISO-8859-15
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8BIT


Hello,

Our DNS was down for a couple of hours and a lot of URLs in our running 
jobs got rejected with "-6 Prerequisite domain-lookup failed". When the 
DNS was back (and after waiting much longer than the time specified in 
Preprocessor/ip-validity-duration-seconds), I extracted these URLs and 
reimported them into the job in the hope that Heritrix would recrawl them. 
But it didn't. All the URLs were immediately rejected with the same -6 
status, without any DNS request. There's no problem in doing DNS lookup 
for any other application (nslookup, curl, wget, ...) on the same machine.

Is there any way to convince Heritrix to change the status of those URLs? 
I wouldn't like to restart the jobs completely as they are nearly at the 
end. Any help would be appreciated. We are still running Heritrix 1.14.4.

Thanks in advance,
   Bert
--
